A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Force fed a pile of forceshit!!! I feel like I'm on crazy pills...hey \"critics\" how much did Mickey Mouse pay all of you to bend over and take it? The Last Jedi leads to anger\, anger leads to hate\, hate leads to 2 1/2 hours of suffering. The plot doesn't advance at all. The whole film is filled with non characters. A bloated non story for fidget spinning moviegoers. JJ lobbed Rian a home run and this film whiffs on all fronts.
